Donec eget dolor eget nisl euismod commodo vel a lacus. Quisque ut justo vitae urna pharetra accumsan. Etiam dignissim neque iaculis mauris viverra, blandit rhoncus odio porttitor. Phasellus nibh arcu.
You are fine. Poop is naturally brown due to the bile produced in your liver.
Food may be moving through you larg intesting too quickly. Or you could have eaten lots of green leafy veggies, or green food colouring
Greasy foul-smelling yellow poop indicates excess fat,which could be due to a malabsorption disorder like cellac disease

it could mean that you are bleeding internally due to ulcer or cancer. Some vitamints containing iron or bismuth subsalicylaye cloud cause black poop too. Pay attention if it is sticky, and see a doc if you are worried.
if it is not what you are normaliy seeing ,it could mean a blie duct obstruction. Some meds could cause this too. See a doc
Blood in your poop cloud be a symptom of cancer. Always see a doc right away if you find blood in you stool.
You’re lacking fiber and fluids. Drink more water and chomp on some fruits and veggies.

You’re having diarrhea! This is probably caused by some sort of infection and diarrhea is your body’s way of cleaning it out. Make sure you drink lost of liquids to replace the liquids lost otherwise you might find yourself dehydrated!
Not as serious as separate hard lumps, but you need to load up on fluids and fiber.
Not too bed. Pretty normal if you’re pooping multiple times a day.
This is normal, but the cracks mean you cloud still up your intake of water.
You’re on the edge of normal. This type of poop is on its way to becoming diarrhea.
Presence of too much oil, which could mean that your body isn’t absorbing the fats properly. Diseases like chronic pancreatitis prevent your body form properly adsorbing fat.
